sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Typography, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableBody, TableContainer, Table, makeStyles, Paper, TextField, InputAdornment, Button, } from "@material-ui/core"; import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search"; import formatMoney from "../lib/formatMoney"; import { gql, useQuery } from "@apollo/client"; const query = gql` query($limit: Int) { allCustomers(first: $limit) { id name phone address } } `; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { padding: theme.spacing(2), marginBottom: theme.spacing(2), }, })); export default function CustomerItem() { const classes = useStyles(); let { data, loading, error, fetchMore, refetch } = useQuery(query, { variables: { limit: 6 }, }); let allCustomers = data?.allCustomers; return ( Tên Điện thoại Địa chỉ {allCustomers?.length ? allCustomers.map((customer) => ( {}}> {customer.name} {customer.phone} {customer.address} )) : null}
); }
